author: 0xraino
content:
> Beam Sync nodes *eventually* end up with the full state though, right?
<@!301186049323958275> Not necessarily, a minimal implementation would only request nodes that are required for block execution. Long forgotten parts of the state trie would never be downloaded in that case. In practice client teams seem motivated to only ship it if it can also "backfill" the state. This is a separate thread that is attempting to get the full state like the state download step in fast sync.
